definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: That inaugural Olympic road race was held on the marathon course.
sentences.chinese: 首屆奧運會自行車公路賽是在馬拉松的賽道上進行的。

sentences.english: To stop, riders must pedal in reverse, which diffentiates from road bikes.
sentences.chinese: 與公路賽不同，死飛在剎車時需要人反向踩踏板。

sentences.english: Now it is the largest bicycle road race in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 現在這是最大的自行車公路賽在亞洲。

definition: Lee Lai-Shan (1970-), former windsurfing world champion from Hong Kong
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success) (idiom)/abbr. for 過五關斬六將|过五关斩六将[guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4]
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委

definition: to give a small demonstration of one's impressive skills (idiom)
